metadata.feature_description: Configure activity stream module settings and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Stream Module Settings via Edit Mode > Admin > Settings > Activity Stream tab
steps.expected: Settings dialog opens with Activity Stream tab selected
steps.actual: Settings dialog opened successfully with all settings visible

steps.action: Click Enable File Attachments checkbox to enable it
steps.actual: Enable File Attachments checkbox was successfully checked

steps.action: Click Enable Photo Attachments checkbox to enable it
steps.actual: Enable Photo Attachments checkbox was successfully checked

steps.action: Change Maximum Characters per message dropdown from 500 to 1000
steps.actual: Successfully changed Maximum Characters per message to 1000

steps.action: Enable Links checkbox in Activity Types section
steps.actual: Links checkbox was successfully enabled in Activity Types

steps.action: Click Update button to save all settings
steps.expected: Settings are saved and dialog closes
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully, dialog closed, and page returned to normal view

steps.action: Reopen Activity Stream Module Settings dialog
steps.expected: Settings dialog opens showing previously saved values
steps.actual: Dialog opened with all previously saved settings intact: Enable File Attachments=checked, Enable Photo Attachments=checked, Maximum Characters=1000, Links=checked

observations: Code review of Settings.ascx reveals NO emoji panel setting exists - the suggested test scenario 'Enable/disable emoji panel' cannot be tested as this feature does not exist in the UI or code

The settings include additional options not listed in test scenarios: Enable Activity Stream Editor, Max Files Per Journal (1-10), Enable View Filters, Enable Grouping of Posts, Default Page Size (5-100)
Activity Types checkbox list contains 36 different activity type filters that can be individually enabled/disabled
Settings inheritance testing was not performed as there is no clear UI path to configure or test inheritance between modules or sites
